title: Shen Bug

embed.description: I decided to play shen when a wild bug appeared. My abilities didnt have any tooltips! And when I ulted it would say "shen_r_anim"!. All modifications are on http://mapskins.com/

body:
I found a bug with shen - I posted a video on it (the link above) and that is a full game with the bug. The ability tooltips are missing!
Riot pls fix.

replies.body: Try doing a repair, tooltips missing and things like this are usually cause by that.
